snippet: Collegiate School, the oldest private school in New York, has purchased land to build new quarters a short distance south on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Collegiate School, New York City’s oldest and one of its most prestigious private schools, has purchased land to build new quarters a short distance south on the Upper West Side; move will be 17th for school since its founding in New Amsterdam in 1628, but first since 1892, when the West End Collegiate Church and Collegiate School moved to neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Collegiate School, the oldest private school in New York, has purchased land to build new quarters a short distance south on the Upper West Side.

headline.seo: Collegiate School, New York’s Oldest Private School, Plans 17th Move
headline.main: School Plans Its 17th Move, but Its First Since 1892
headline.print_headline: School Plans Its 17th Move, But Its First Since 1892
